text: (Aur yeh baat Allah ne aagaaz e takhleeq hi mein saaf farma di thi ke) aey bani Adam, yaad rakkho, agar tumhare paas khud tumhi mein se aisey Rasool aayein jo tumhein meri aayat suna rahey hon, to jo koi nafarmani se bachega aur apne rawayye ki islaah karlega uske liye kisi khauf aur ranjj ka mauqa nahin hai
